Update Notes
=============

Beside the new game version, this release adds support for following DLC

Metro: Last Light - Faction Pack

Experience 3 original Metro missions as a specialist  from  the  different
factions. Play as a Special Detachment Sniper of the  Red  Line,  a  Hanza
Ranger, and a Reich Heavy Squad Soldier. This pack  also  includes  5  new
deadly weapons: the Abzac, Hellbreath, Medved, C4 Grenade, and the  Silent
Sniper Rifle
